description: This file initializes a YouTube knowledge base and an agent, configuring them with environment variables and external dependencies, then performs a query to extract the major focus of the knowledge.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: YouTubeKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that fetches and processes YouTube content.

classes.name: YouTubeReader
classes.description: A reader component for processing YouTube video data.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client for storing and retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating its data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, formatted as markdown.
